metadata.title: CVE-2021-32270 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in gpac through 20200801. A NULL pointerdereference exists in the function vwid_box_del located in box_code_base.c.It allows an attacker to cause Denial of Service.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
